description: Publish a marketing page making it publicly accessible. Accepts PublishMarketingPageInput with pageId (required, String). Sets isPublished to true and publishedAt timestamp. Returns MarketingPage with pageId, title, isPublished (true), publishedAt (DateTime). Raises NotFoundError (404) if page not found. Raises ForbiddenError (403) if not Admin.
graphql_operation: mutation PublishMarketingPage($input: PublishMarketingPageInput!) { marketing { publishMarketingPage(input: $input) { pageId title isPublished publishedAt } } }
